level-filesystem.description: Full implementation of the Node.js `fs` module on top of [levelup].

browserify-fs.description: [level-filesystem] as drop-in `fs` replacement for the browser, to be used with `browserify`.

level-fs-browser.description: [level-fs] as drop-in `fs` replacement for the browser, to be used with `browserify`.

level-store.description: A streaming storage engine based on [levelup].

level-serve.description: Streaming static file server based on [levelup].

level-vinyl.description: [Vinyl](https://github.com/gulpjs/vinyl-fs) adapter and blob store. Saves file contents in a content addressable blob store, file metadata in [levelup].

level-blob-store.description: An [`abstract-blob-store`](https://github.com/maxogden/abstract-blob-store) using LevelDB as the storage backend

level-server.description: Standalone LevelDB file server based on [level-serve], [multilevel] and [level-sublevel].
